turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an order from Petes Coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 367 State St in Los Altos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I have one Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Small, Medium, and Large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many calories are in the large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What non dairy options are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond and Soy Milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What else is in the coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cream, chocolate, and espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. Can I have the large Caffe Mocha with soy milk. No Cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I have one large Caffe Mocha with soy milk, and no Cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Your order will be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to your mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Youre welcome. Have a nice day/
